effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has the same type as the user.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has the same type as the user.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has the same type as the user.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.
